name: Senior Consultant, Fixed Assets/Real Estate, Deal Advisory
description:
KPMG’s integrated team of specialists works at deal speed to help you find and drive value throughout your transformation and transaction lifecycle:

  • solve the problems faced by property owners and real estate investors, property development companies and real estate investment funds, as well as companies for which real estate property is a non-core asset
  • advise our clients on mergers, acquisitions and disposals, joint ventures, partnerships & alliances, shareholder and management buyouts, shareholder financing needs
  • provides advice on managing divestments and acquisitions of companies in Kazakhstan, performs valuation engagements and other corporate finance tasks.

Requirements:

  • Higher education (technical background preferably or engineer)
  • 4+ years of relevant experience in fixed assets / real estate valuation under Kazakhstan valuation standards and International valuation standards
  • Understanding of applicability and specifics of each valuation approach in Kazakhstan valuation practice
  • Specific certification would be a plus

Responsibilities:

  • Participating in projects regarding valuation of fixed assets and real estate (buildings, equipment etc.) including international clients
  • Analyzing enterprise construction costs
  • Creating models based on large amounts of data
  • Analyzing operating processes in various industries
  • Dealing with technical documentation
  • Preparing reports

What we offer:

  • Working as part of an experienced team on complex valuation projects
  • Excellent opportunities for career and professional growth
  • Great professional team and friendly environment
  • Comfortable office.
